title: Subpart 34-1 - Health Care Practitioner Referrals
content:

State Regulations

§ 34-1.2 - Definitions
§ 34-1.3 - Referrals prohibited
§ 34-1.4 - Disclosure: clinical laboratory services, pharmacy services, radiation therapy services, or x-ray or imaging services
§ 34-1.5 - Disclosure: other health or health related items or services

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
